helpText: ó_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________à.

generic.title: ó_Error updating categories__________________________à
generic.message: ó_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________à.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ó_Error updating categories__________________________à
maxDepthExceeded.message: ó_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________à.

destinationHasSameName.title: ó_Error updating categories__________________________à
destinationHasSameName.message: ó_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________à.

noSchema.title: ó_Schema not found_________________à
noSchema.message: ó_Item schema not found for user_________________à.

maxCharacter.title: ó_Error updating categories__________________________à
maxCharacter.message: ó_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________à.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ó_Delete category________________à
deleteInUseCategory.message: ó_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________à.

custom.title: ó_Custom categories__________________à
custom.message: ó_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________à.

arcgis.title: ó_ArcGIS categories__________________à
arcgis.message: ó_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________à.

iso.title: ó_ISO categories_______________à
iso.message: ó_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________à.

inspire.title: ó_INSPIRE categories___________________à
inspire.message: ó_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________à.
